children.value: The nodes with the same depth will be layed on the same level. The node size will be considred while doing layout.

对 G6 的性能测试，用来验证 G6 能够承载的数据量，分别使用 5000+ 图元、将近 20000 图元及 50000+ 图元的示例进行了测试，从结果来看，20000 左右图元时，G6 是可以正常交互的，当数据量达到 50000+ 时，交互就会出现一定的卡顿，但对于绝大部分业务来说，都不建议在画布上展示如此多的数据，具体的做法可以参考 AntV G6 团队的大图可视化方案，预计 1122 发布。
G6 Performance test, we provide three data volume cases: 5k+ graphic shapes、amlost 2w graphic shapes and 5W+ graphic shapes.

Force-directed layout is a set of algorithms which are imporved and extended by lots of researchers based on the earliest classical force-directed algorithm. They simulate the nodes and edges in the graph as the physical objects. There are attractive forces and repulsive forces between nodes to iteratively move them to reach a reasonable layout.
The classical force-directed layout in G6 comes from d3.js. As the demo below, you can deploy it in
while instantiating Graph. it can also be used for
Example 1 : Basic force-directed layout and dragging interactions.
Example 3 : Adjust the link distances and forces for different nodes.
Example 5 : Translate the layout parameters in dynamic.
Example 6 : The bubbles layout and interactions.
Example 7 : Constrain the layout in a certain area.
力导向图布局作为较早被发明的一种实际应用布局算法，经过研究者多年改进、扩展，已发展成为一类算法的集合。该类算法的特点是模拟物理世界中的作用力，施加在节点上，并迭代计算以达到合理放置节点、美观布局的一类算法。
G6 内置的经典力导向算法引用了 d3.js 的力导向算法。如下面代码所示，可在实例化 Graph 时使用该布局。除此之外，还可以如
代码演示 1 ：基础的经典力导向布局及节点的拖拽。
代码演示 3 ：为不同节点调整边长和力。
代码演示 4 ：固定被拖拽的节点。
代码演示 5 ：支持布局参数的动态切换。
代码演示 6 ：使用力导向算法实现气泡效果及交互。
代码演示 7 ：约束在一定范围内进行力导向布局。
G6 共内置了 8 种不同类型的节点，支持通过配置项进行扩展。
用户可根据具体的业务场景，选择合适的内置节点。如，矩形节点适合在流程图中使用。
用于配置相关边的连入位置。更多内容请参考
There are 8 kinds of built-in nodes in G6, which can be extended by configurations.
8 built-in nodes and their extensions allow users to select appropriate ones for their scenario. For example, rect node is suitable for flow graph. Parameter
is the link points for related edges.
Highlighting a node and its neighbors when user hover it is a common requirement in graph analysis applications.
The demos below show two ways to satisfy the highlight requirement:
决策树，支持默认层级， 支持展开、收起、悬停、点击等交互。
在图分析应用中，鼠标 hover 到某个节点后，高亮其相邻的节点及边是一种非常常见的需求。
该示例演示了 G6 内置的 activate-relations 和自定义实现高亮相邻节点的方式。另外，如果内置高亮关注点及其邻居的行为不能满足需求，用户也可以通过使用
Decision tree, supports default levels, supports expand, collapse, hover, click, etc.
不管数据的深度多少，总是叶节点对齐。不考虑节点大小，布局时将节点视为 1 个像素点。
生态树适用于展示树结构数据，配合 TreeGraph 使用。如下面代码所示，可在实例化 TreeGraph 时使用该布局。
The leaves will be aligned on the same level. This algorithm does not consider the node size, which means all the nodes will be regarded as unit size with 1px.

You can set different configurations for different nodes if the parameter is Function type. Please refer to the ducuments for more information.

Dagre 是适合有向流程图的布局算法。其根据图数据中边的方向，自动计算节点的层级及位置。
G6 内置的 Dagre 布局可以实现有向图的自动分层布局。如下面代码所示，可在实例化 Graph 时使用该布局。除此之外，还可以如
所示单独使用布局。该布局可以通过配置调整布局方向、节点对齐方式、节点间距、层高等。
代码演示 1 ：简单的 Dagre 布局。
代码演示 2 ：带有 Combo 的 Dagre 布局（目前只能处理好同层节点的 Combo 问题）。
代码演示 3 ：自左向右向上对齐的 Dagre 布局。
代码演示 4 ：自左向右的 Dagre 布局。
代码演示 5 ：Dagre 布局参数动态变化。
Dagre Layout is an appropriate layout method for directed flow graph. It will calculate the levels and positions of nodes automatically according to the edge directions in the data.
As the demo below, you can deploy it in
while instantiating Graph. it can also be used for
. By tuning the parameters, you can adjust the layout direction, node alignment, node separation, level separation, and so on.
Example 3 : Dagre layout from left to right and align top.
Example 4 : Dagre layout from left to right.
Example 5 : Translate the layout parameters in dynamic.

Move a subtree to a new parent by dragging the root node of the subtree.
Drag the root node of the subtree to get closed to a new parent which is not a descendant node of the dragged node, drop the node to finish.
通过拖拽子树的根节点，靠近新的父节点后放下，可将该子树从原来位置删除，追加到新父节点下，从而改变树的结构。若新父节点是被拖拽子树中的一个节点，则拖拽改变结构将不会生效。
该案例展示了圣诞夜与圣诞节网友们在 Tweeter 上发送的推文中，出现频率 top 100 的单词。可以通过拖拽、点击等交互，查看单词的上下文。
：别人家的彩蛋是彩蛋，而我们的"彩蛋"是个课堂作业：
实现了该 demo 后，我们发现了一个小 Bug：由于 ’christmas‘ 的上下文节点众多，展开它后，在布局即将收敛时出现了疯狂的抖动鬼畜。欢迎在
This demo shows the top 100 hot words on Tweeter at Christmas eve and Christmas day. You can drag and click the nodes to explore the context of the top words.
: It is might not a real Easter Eggs since it looks like a homework:

After implementing the graph visualization above, we found a Bug: There are lots of context nodes for ‘christmas’. It begins to swing violently as the layout was about to converge after being expanded. Welcome PR on
深度相同的节点将会被放置在同一层，与 compactBox 不同的是，布局不会考虑节点的大小。
脑图树适用于展示树结构数据，配合 TreeGraph 使用。如下面代码所示，可在实例化 TreeGraph 时使用该布局。
该布局有以下配置项，Function 类型的配置项可以为不同的元素配置不同的值。具体描述请查看相关教程。
: String 类型，树的布局方向。可选值有：'H'：根节点的子节点分成两部分横向放置在根节点左右两侧 ，如代码演示 1 | 'V'：将根节点的所有孩子纵向排列。
: Number | Function 类型，每个节点的宽度。
: Number | Function 类型，每个节点的高度。
: Number | Function 类型，每个节点的水平间隙。
: Number | Function 类型，每个节点的垂直间隙。
: Function 类型，节点排布在根节点的左侧/右侧。若设置了该值，则所有节点会在根节点同一侧，即 direction = 'H' 不再起效。若该参数为回调函数，则可以指定每一个节点在根节点的左/右侧。如代码演示 2、3、4。
The nodes with same depth will be placed on the same level. Difference from compactBox, Mindmap will not consider the node size.
Mindmap is an appropriate layout method for tree data structure. Please use it with TreeGraph. As the demo below, you can deploy it in
You can set different configurations for different nodes if the parameter is Function type. Please refer to the ducuments for more information.

Fruchterman Reingold Layout is a kind of force-directed layout in theory. The differences are the definitions of attracitve force and repulsive force.
As the demo below, you can deploy it in
while instantiating Graph. it can also be used for
. By tuning the parameters, you can adjust the iteration number, layout compactness, layout by clusters, and so on.
Example 3 : Translate the layout parameters in dynamic.
Example 4 : Fruchterman layout with web-worker in case layout calculation takes too long to block page interaction.
Fruchterman Reingold 布局算法在原理上而言属于力导向布局算法。其引力与斥力的定义方式与经典的 Force Diected 力导向图布局有少许不同。
G6 内置的 Fruchterman 布局可在实例化 Graph 时使用该布局。除此之外，还可以如
所示单独使用布局。该布局可以通过配置调整迭代次数、紧凑程度、是否按照聚类布局等。
代码演示 1 ：基本的 Fruchterman 布局。
代码演示 2 ：Fruchterman 的聚类布局。
代码演示 3 ：Fruchterman 布局参数动态变化。
代码演示 4 ：Fruchterman 使用 web-worker 以避免阻塞页面。

This is a interactive graph visualization which asisits users to find out an appropriate visualization method for their usage. The demo is combined with lots of features of G6, including custom node, custom edge, force directed layout, data change, interactions, and so on. It is applied on homepage of AntV.
这是一个带交互的图表决策图，辅助用户“按使用目的”寻找合适的可视化方式。该 demo 结合了自定义节点、自定义边、力导向布局、数据切换、交互等功能，已应用在 AntV 官网。
In indented tree layout, each node takes a row or a column.
Indented is an appropriate layout method for tree data structure. Please use it with TreeGraph. As the demo below, you can deploy it in
You can set different configurations for different nodes if the parameter is Function type. Please refer to the ducuments for more information.
缩进树布局。每个元素会占一行/一列。
缩进树适用于展示树结构数据，配合 TreeGraph 使用。如下面代码所示，可在实例化 TreeGraph 时使用该布局。
该布局有以下配置项，Function 类型的配置项可以为不同的元素配置不同的值。具体描述请查看相关教程。
Bundling is a built-in components in G6. It is used for bundling the complex edges to reduce the visual clutter.
The demo below show how to use Bundling on graph.
G6 中内置的 Bundling 组件，用于边的绑定。
下面的代码演示展示了如何在图上使用 Bundling。
Radial 辐射布局根据参数中指定的 focusNode 为中心点，根据其他节点与中心点的拓扑距离（最短路径长度）将其余节点放置在以中心点为圆心的同心圆上。
G6 内置的 Radial 布局可在实例化 Graph 时使用该布局。除此之外，还可以如
所示单独使用布局。该布局可以通过配置调整辐射半径、节点不重叠、不严格的辐射布局等。
代码演示 1 ：基本的 Radial 布局。
代码演示 2 ：根据不同的节点大小计算节点不重叠。
代码演示 3 ：不严格的辐射布局允许同层节点有前后交错以避免节点重叠。
代码演示 4 ：利用子图布局机制可以实现点击节点进行扩展的功能，请尝试点击 2 号节点。
代码演示 5 ：Radial 布局参数动态变化。
代码演示 6 ：同层节点按照指定字段聚类。

In radial tree layout, root node will be placed on the center. the branches will be placed in radial around the root. Dendrogram and CompactBox can be transformed into radial tree by configuration.
Radial tree layout is a deformation of Dendrogram and CompactBox. It is an appropriate layout method for tree data structure. Please use it with TreeGraph. As the demo below, you can deploy it in

Circular 环形布局根据参数指定的排序方式对节点进行排序后，将节点排列在圆环上。

Circular layout orders the nodes according to the configuration, and then places the nodes on a circle.

while instantiating Graph. it can also be used for
. By tuning the configurations, you can adjust the radius, start angle, end angle, nodes' order method, divisions, spiral style, and so on.

Thanks to the item's custom mechanism of G6, users can design their own tree with freedom.
Combining with custom items, the complex tree visualization can be realized.
Examples 1 : Customize the node and the edge with tree graph, support add or remove node.
Examples 3 : Customize the node with expand and collapse button.
G6 自定义节点与边机制允许用户对树图视觉样式进行定制。
通过结合自定义元素，可以实现较为复杂的树可视化。
代码演示 1： 自定义树图中的节点及边，支持增加和删除节点；
代码演示 2 ：为边增加文本标签。
代码演示 3 ：自定义带有收缩/扩展按钮的节点。
TimeBar is a build-in component in G6.
The demo below shows how to use TimeBar on graph. The second demo demonstrates the configurations for the TimeBar.
G6 中内置的 TimeBar 组件。
下面的代码演示展示了如何在图上使用 TimeBar。TimeBar 的样式可以参考 demo 2 进行配置。
当需要对已有的节点，做统一的自定义动画效果时，可以使用这种方式来实现。
G6 中更多关于动画的内容，请参考
The demo shows how to set a global uniform animation.
For more information, please refer to document
Grid 网格布局根据参数指定的排序方式对节点进行排序后，将节点排列在网格上。
G6 内置的 Grid 网格布局可在实例化 Graph 时使用该布局。除此之外，还可以如
所示单独使用布局。该布局可以通过配置调整节点排序方式、行数、列数、节点不重叠等。
代码演示 1 ：基本的网格布局，节点根据在数据中的顺序排列。
代码演示 2 ：节点根据数据中的 cluster 属性排序。
Grid Layout will order the nodes according to the parameters, and then place the nodes on the grids.
As the demo below, you can deploy it in
while instantiating Graph. it can also be used for

. By tuning the parameters, you can adjust the iteration number, compact degree, layout buy cluster, and so on. By tuning the parameters, you can adjust the ordering method, rows, cols, prevent node overlappings, and so on.
Example 1 : Basic Grid Layout, the nodes are ordered according to the data.
Example 2 : Order the nodes according to the property
The custom edge mechanism in G6 allows users to design their own edge when there are no appropriate built-in edges for their scenario.
The first two demos below show how to customize polyline edge. There are two ways to customize an edge:
Updating the control points of polyline while dragging the end nodes is an important problem of polyline edge. For this situation, we recommend users to use built-in
The third demo shows how to customize an edge with multiple labels.
For more information, please refer to the document
当 G6 的内置边不能满足需求时，G6 的自定义边机制允许用户设计和定制新的边类型。
下面的前两个代码演示了自定义折线 polyline 边。自定义边可以通过两种方式实现：
拖动边的两个端点时，常常需要动态更新折线的控制点位置。建议使用 G6 内置的
第三个代码演示了自定义带有多个文本标签的边。
G6 supports node group. We recommend to use the new mechanism
G6 supports two kinds of node group:
. They can be applied to group navigation and clustering analysis.
G6 支持节点分组。建议使用新的分组机制
两种类型的节点分组，可用于团伙导航或聚类分析。
Use a smooth contour to wrap a specified set of nodes.
Hull is used for wrapping a set of nodes, to emphasize the sets or groups in the graph and do not affect the original node positions and the layout. There are three types of hull:
type generates a rounded polygon, the
configuration generates a closed spline contour and the
type generates a smooth concave hull that could avoids

. The hulls could be updated interactively. In the first example below, the blue one is of bubble type and green is a rounded convex hull. The two hulls listen for node changes and then be updated, so that they always wrap the nodes. In the second example, the red bubble allows its members to be dragged in and out, and its members could be added by right clicking on the canvas. The blue bubble is updated according to node changes. For the complete configuration, please refer to the API documentation:
使用平滑的轮廓来包裹指定的一组节点集合。
节点集轮廓包裹常用语交互过程中，对团伙标记与分析，尤其是在不希望影响原图布局的情况下。轮廓包裹的形状支持
为平滑曲线凸包轮廓，这两种凸包轮廓不可排除配置项中的 nonMembers；
为自由凹包轮廓，可以排除 nonMembers。可配合事件监听实现轮廓的动态更新。下面的第一个示例中，蓝色为 bubble 类型轮廓， 绿色为 round-convex 类型轮廓，轮廓监听节点变化进行更新，始终包裹节点。第二个示例中，红色气泡配合节点 drag 事件，实现节点拖进拖出，右击可以增加内部成员；蓝色凸包随节点位置更新，始终包裹节点。完整的配置项请参考 API 文档：
As the demo below, to satisfy such a highly customized requirments, users can custom nodes and edges by themself.
对于一些定制化比较强的需求，使用 G6 内置的节点和边很难实现。下面的资金流向图是通过自定义节点和边的方式实现的。
G6 中内置的 Fisheye 组件。
Fisheye 鱼眼放大镜是为 focus+context 的探索场景设计的，它能够保证在放大关注区域的同时，保证上下文以及上下文与关注中心的关系不丢失。下面的代码演示展示了如何在图上使用 Fisheye。Fisheye 放大镜的样式可以通过
Fisheye is a built-in components for focus+context magnification in G6.

Fisheye is designed for focus_context exploration, it keeps the context and the relationships between context and the focus while magnifing the focus area. The demo below shows how to use fisheye on graph. And the Fisheye lens's style can be configured by
. The API can be found at
Concentric 同心圆布局将所有节点放置在同心圆上。
G6 内置的 Concentric 同心圆布局可在实例化 Graph 时使用该布局。除此之外，还可以如
所示单独使用布局。该算法首先根据参数指定的排序方式对节点进行排序。排序越靠前，节点将会被放置在越中心的位置。
Concentric Layout places the nodes on concentric circles.
As the demo below, you can deploy it in
while instantiating Graph. it can also be used for
. This algorithm will order the nodes according to the parameters first, then the node in the front of the order will be placed on the center of the concentric circles.
当 G6 的内置 Combo 不能满足需求时，G6 的自定义 Combo 机制允许用户通过扩展内置 Combo 来设计和定制新的节点类型。
下面示例展示了通过扩展内置的 Circle 和 Rect Combo，进行 Combo 的自定义。更多信息参见
The custom combo mechanism in G6 allows users to design their own node by extending the built-in combo types when there are no appropriate built-in nodes for their scenario.
The following examples show how to custom a combo type by extending the built-in combo types. For more information, please refer to
通过交互改变节点的位置。
点击某个节点，让其移动到画布中心。
第一个示例：带有动画地移动图；
第二个示例：不带动画移动图。
Move the graph to focus on the clicked node, which means pan the canvas to center at the clicked node.
1st demo: move the graph with animation;
2nd demo: move the graph without animation.
使用 G6 可视化美国航线图，使用边绑定工具降低视觉混乱。
在大规模图上，使用边绑定可以降低视觉混乱，更清晰地展示图的整体走势、结构，突出航线频繁的城市，它们可能是重要的交通枢纽，并展示更多的统计信息，以便观察者进行分析。图中颜色映射航班的飞行方向（出发（橙红色）与降落（青色））。节点大小表示到达与离开该城市的航班总数量，每个节点使用了饼图展示达到（橙红色）和离开（青色）航班的比例。并增加 hover 的交互，使用 tooltip 展示每个城市的经纬度。
An American airlines graph with edge bundling powered by G6. Edge bundling helps developers to reduce the visual clutter.

On large graph, edge bundling helps developers to reduce the visual clutter, and visualizes the graph with clearer trend and structures. To show more statistical information, we draw each node with a pie chart which indicates the ratio of arrival(orange) and leaving(cyan) airlines on the corresponding city. The gradient colors of the edges map the direction of airlines. The tooltip with longitude and latitude information will show up when user hovers on each node.
This graph demonstrates the fire affectness and population on different cities of Australia. The data comes from NASA, which includes the fire points of Australia detected by the satellites.

The root node represents Australia. The nodes on the second level are the states of Australia. The leaves of the graph represent the main cities of Australia. The sizes of the leaves indicate the population of the corresponding cities. The bars on the leaves show the number of the fire points in the corresponding city everyday, which is detected by the satellites. The color of a leaf is mapped to the degree of the fire effectiveness in the region, which is the average brightness of the fire points in the region detected by the satellites.
本图展示了 2020 年 1 月 11 日到 18 日的火灾情况，数据来源于 NASA 公开数据，由卫星拍摄到的起火点。
图上的根节点代表了澳大利亚；第二级节点代表了澳大利亚的各个州；最外圈节点（叶子节点）代表了澳大利亚各个州的主要城市。叶子节点的大小代表了该城市人口总数的多少；叶子节点上的柱子高低代表了该城市每天起火点的数量（卫星检测到该区域的起火点数量）；节点颜色代表了该区域每天的受灾情况（由卫星检测到的该区域的起火点的明亮度（brightness）的平均值）。
MDS（Multidemensional Scaling）本是用于高维数据降维的算法。关系图数据可视化中的布局可以看作是高维数据降维到二维屏幕空间中。
G6 内置的 MDS 布局可在实例化 Graph 时使用该布局。除此之外，还可以如
所示单独使用布局。该算法可配置边的长度。
Classical MDS（Multidemensional Scaling）is an algorithm for high dimensional data projection. Relational data layout problem can be regarded as projecting high dimensional data onto a 2D visual space.
As the demo below, you can deploy it in
while instantiating Graph. it can also be used for
. By tuning the parameters, you can adjust the edge length.
节点或边上的文本超长时，可以通过使用 JS 来计算文本长度，也可以通过使用
来进行换行。G6 提供了
辅助计算文本长度，但仅适用于默认字体。
Proccess the long label in G6.
When the label of node or edge has long text, we recommend to calculate the length by JS, and use
to wrap the worlds. G6 has
to help users to calculate the length of the text, but they are only precise for default font family.
G6 的图元素中，可能只想响应部分元素的事件，如节点中的某个 icon、树图中的展开收起 icon 等。
Region response on a node or edge.
The following demo shows region(e.g. an small icon of a node) response on a node or edge.
弧线图是一种图的可视化形式。其将节点排列在一个轴上，边以弧线的形式连接节点。
代码演示 1 ：通过指定节点位置，并根据节点间距计算 arc 弧线类型边的弧高度可以实现基础弧线图。
代码演示 2 ：指定节点位置到圆环上，使用 quadratic 二阶贝塞尔曲线类型的边实现了弧线图的变种 —— 环形弧线图。
Arc diagram is a method of graph visualization. It places the nodes on one axis, and connects the nodes by arcs.
Example 1 : Place the node positions to an axis, and calculate the heights of the arcs according to the distances between endpoints.
Example 2 : Circular Arc Diagram is a deformation of Arc Diagram. In this example, the nodes are placed on a circle, the edges are quadratic bezier curves.
设置 Node 或 Edge label 的背景。
当节点或边上的 label 需要设置背景时，通过在 style 中增加 background 来实现。
设置节点 label 的背景：
Set the background of the label on Node or Edge.
Set the background of the label on edge：
Set the background of the label on node:

You can change to different modes with the selector on the left top. Dragging node, adding node, adding edge are enabled in different modes. This mechanism help developers to avoid the conflict of same events in different behaviors.
Change to different modes with the selector on the left top.
When the 'Default' is selected, the mode is changed to default: The node will move withe the mouse when user drags it; The node will be selected when user clicks it;
When 'Add Node' is selected, the mode is changed to addNode: A new node will be added when user clicks the blank part of the canvas; The node will be selected when user clicks it;
When 'Add Edge' is selected, the mode is changed to addEdge: An new edge will be added when user clicks two different end nodes.
使用左上角的下拉框切换交互模式，在不同模式下拖动节点、增加节点、增加边，从而避免交互事件的冲突。
使用左上角的下拉框切换交互模式：
选择 “Default” 按钮时，切换到 default 交互模式：拖拽节点时节点跟随鼠标移动；点击节点时选中该节点；
选择 “Add Node” 按钮时，切换到  addNode 交互模式：点击空白区域在点击处增加一个节点；点击节点时选中该节点；
选择 “Add Edge” 按钮时，切换到 addEdge 交互模式：依次点击两个节点将会在这两个节点之间添加一条边。
Process the parellel edges whose end nodes are the same by the built-in Util method
. If the edges are loop, they will be asigned
with different position and loop height to avoid edge overlappings. If the edges are not loop, they will be assigned
with different control points to avoid edge overlappings. To achieve better rendering result, we recommended configure the
两节点间存在多条边时，可以使用 G6 内置的工具函数
处理。它将会自动检测边数据中两端点相同的边。若为自环边，则它们的
，并且自动计算自环高度与位置以放置重叠；若不是自环边，则它们的
二次贝塞尔曲线,并自动计算控制点位置，以避免相互重叠。为达到更好的展示效果，建议在实例化图时，将
It is a new feature of V3.5.

Combo Force is designed for the graph with combos based on classical force directed layout algorith. It modifies the forces between nodes according to their combo infomation to achieve a final result with clustering nodes inside each combo and no overlappings.
for the graph with combos. Other layouts in G6 are also availabel, but they do not consider the combo infomation.
Combo Force 是基于力导向的专用于带有 combo 的图的布局算法。通过自研改造经典力导向算法，将根据节点的 combo 信息，施加不同的力以达到同 combo 节点尽可能聚集，不同 combo 之间尽可能无重叠的布局。
在有 Combo 的图上，推荐使用
布局。其他内置布局将不会考虑 Combo 信息对布局的影响。
. The following demo shows how to custom a behavior to allow drag and zoom canvas with two fingers on touchpad and wheel.
不能满足需求时，可以自定义交互。
。下面示例演示了如何使用自定义交互机制实现使用鼠标滚轮或触摸板双指拖动和缩放画布。
为了在缩放画布时能够保持关注节点/边的高亮效果，v3.5.11 推出了内置交互 'zoom-canvas' 的配置项
以达到缩放画布时固定选中节点的需求。
配置内置交互 'zoom-canvas' 的配置项
，可达到在缩小画布时固定选定的元素的大小、文本大小、描边粗细。详见

，则拖拽画布时，将隐藏除节点 keyShape 以外的所有图形。

The global rendering will be triggered frequently, which costs a lot. To improve the performance of drag-canvas, v3.5.11 supports a boolean type configuration
for built-in behavior 'drag-canvas' to hide the shapes besides keyShape of nodes.
This demo hide the shapes beside the keyShape of nodes by configuring the built-in behavesides

G6 为用户提供了布局参数动态切换、布局方法动态切换、数据动态切换、子图布局、布局时机监听、自定义布局等布局相关等机制。
代码演示 1 ：控制子图（红色节点）使用经典力导向算法进行子图布局。
代码演示 2 ：布局数据可以动态切换。
代码演示 3 ：G6 提供了自定义布局机制，可以随心所欲定制自己的布局。
代码演示 4 ：G6 开放了布局的监听时机 ——
G6 provides the mechanism for layout paramters translation, layout methods translation, data translation, subgraph layout, layout timing for listener, custom layout, and so on.
Example 1 : Subgrpah(red nodes) layout by force-directed layout.
Example 2 : Tranlate the layout parameters in dynamic.
Example 3 : Custom layout for a bigraph.
参见对应的 Dendrogram 与 CompactBox 布局的 API。
Please refer to the corresponding API of Dendrogram or CompactBox.
：树布局的方向，默认为，其他选项说明
H：horizontal（水平）—— 根节点的子节点分成两部分横向放置在根节点左右两侧
V：vertical （竖直）—— 将根节点的所有孩子纵向排列
：节点排布在根节点的左侧/右侧。若设置了该值，则所有节点会在根节点同一侧，即 direction = 'H' 不再起效。若该参数为回调函数，则可以指定每一个节点在根节点的左/右侧
H —— Root is on the middle, layout in horizontal symmetry.
V —— Root is on the middle, layout in vertical symmetry.
: The callback function of node position(left or right of root node). Only affects the nodes which are connected to the root node directly. And the descendant nodes will be placed according to it.
：树布局的方向，默认为，其他选项说明
LR —— 根节点在左，往右布局（下图左）
RL —— 根节点在右，往左布局（下图中）
H —— 根节点在中间，水平对称布局（下图右）
：节点放置在根节点左侧或右侧的回调函数，仅对与根节点直接相连的节点有效，设置后将会影响被设置节点的所有子孙节点
：每个节点的第一个自节点是否位于下一行。默认为
TB —— Root is on the top, layout from the top to the bottom
BT —— Root is on the bottom, layout from the bottom to the top
LR —— Root is on the left, layout from the left to the right
RL —— Root is on the right, layout from the right to the left
H —— Root is on the middle, layout in horizontal symmetry.
V —— Root is on the middle, layout in vertical symmetry.
: Wheter layout the graph in radial style. If
：树布局的方向，默认为，其他选项说明
TB —— 根节点在上，往下布局

LR —— 根节点在左，往右布局
RL —— 根节点在右，往左布局
H —— 根节点在中间，水平对称布局
V —— 根节点在中间，垂直对称布局
：树布局的方向，默认为，其他选项说明
TB —— 根节点在上，往下布局
BT —— 根节点在下，往上布局
LR —— 根节点在左，往右布局

V —— 根节点在中间，垂直对称布局

BT —— Root is on the bottom, layout from the bottom to the top
LR —— Root is on the left, layout from the left to the right
RL —— Root is on the right, layout from the right to the left
H —— Root is on the middle, layout in horizontal symmetry.
V —— Root is on the middle, layout in vertical symmetry.
: If layout the graph in radial style. If
LR —— Root is on the left, layout from the left to the right(left image below)
RL —— Root is on the right, layout from the right to the left(center image below)
H —— Root is on the middle, layout in horizontal symmetry(right image below)
: The width of node. Takes effect when
: The callback function of node position(left or right of root node). Only affects the nodes which are connected to the root node directly. And the descendant nodes will be placed according to it
: Whether place the first child node at the next line.
：辐射的中心点，默认为数据中第一个节点。可以传入节点 id 或节点本身
：每一圈距离上一圈的距离。默认填充整个画布，即根据图的大小决定
：是否防止重叠，必须配合下面属性
，只有设置了与当前图节点大小相同的
值，才能够进行节点重叠的碰撞检测
：节点大小（直径）。用于防止节点重叠时的碰撞检测
时生效, 防止重叠时节点边缘间距的最小值。可以是回调函数, 为不同节点设置不同的最小间距, 如示例 2 所示
：防止重叠步骤的最大迭代次数
：是否必须是严格的 radial 布局，及每一层的节点严格布局在一个环上。
时，有重叠的节点严格沿着所在的环展开，但在一个环上若节点过多，可能无法完全避免节点重叠。
时，允许同环上重叠的节点不严格沿着该环布局，可以在该环的前后偏移以避免重叠。
（左）preventOverlap = false。（中）preventOverlap = false，strictRadial = true。（右）preventOverlap = false，strictRadial = false。
: 同层节点布局后相距远近的依据。默认
，表示根据数据的拓扑结构（节点间最短路径）排布，即关系越近/点对间最短路径越小的节点将会被尽可能排列在一起；
表示按照节点在数据中的顺序排列，即在数据顺序上靠近的节点将会尽可能排列在一起；也可以指定为节点数据中的某个字段名，例如
指定的方式计算出距离越小的越靠近。
: 是否启用 web-worker 以防布局计算时间过长阻塞页面交互
: The focus node of the radial layout. The first node of the data is the default value. It can be the id of a node or the node item.
: The separation between adjacent circles. If
is not assigned, the layout will fill the canvas automatically.
: Whether to prevent node overlappings. To activate preventing node overlappings,
is required, which is used for collide detection. The size in the node data will take effect if
: The diameter of the node. It is used for preventing node overlappings
. It is the minimum distance between nodes to prevent node overlappings. It can be a function to define different distances for different nodes (example 2)
: The maximum iteration number of preventing node overlappings
: Whether to layout the graph as strict radial, which means the nodes will be arranged on each circle strictly. Takes effect only when
, the overlapped nodes are arranged along their circles strictly. But for the situation that there are too many nodes on a circle to be arranged, the overlappings might not be eliminated completely
, the overlapped nodes can be arranged around their circle with small offsets.
（Left）preventOverlap = false.（Center）preventOverlap = false, strictRadial = true. (Right)preventOverlap = false, strictRadial = false.
: Sort the nodes of the same level.
by default, which means place the nodes with connections as close as possible;
means place the node according to the ordering in data, the closer the nodes in data ordering, the closer the nodes will be placed.
also can be assigned to any name of property in nodes data, such as
and so on (make sure the property exists in the data)
: The strength to sort the nodes in the same circle. Larger number means place the nodes with smaller distance of
more closely. Takes effect only when
: Whether to enable the web-worker in case layout calculation takes too long to block page interaction
: Whether to enable the web-worker in case layout calculation takes too long to block page interaction
: The place where the grid begin (left top)
: Whether to prevent node overlappings. To activate preventing node overlappings,
is required, which is used for collide detection. The size in the node data will take effect if
is not assigned. If the size in node data does not exist either,
: The diameter of the node. It is used for preventing node overlappings.
: The minimum padding between nodes to prevent node overlappings. Takes effect when
: Wheter to utilize the minimum space of the canvas.
: The row number of the grid. If
is undefined, the algorithm will calculate it according to the space and node numbers automatically
: The column number of the grid. If
is undefined, the algorithm will calculate it according to the space and node numbers automatically
: The ordering method for nodes. Smaller the index in the ordered array, more center the node will be placed. If
is undefined, the algorithm order the nodes according to their degrees
: Whether to enable the web-worker in case layout calculation takes too long to block page interaction

，只有设置了与当前图节点大小相同的

时表示利用所有可用画布空间，为
时表示利用最小的画布空间

：网格的列数，为 undefined 时算法根据节点数量、布局空间、

: 是否启用 web-worker 以防布局计算时间过长阻塞页面交互
: The gravity, which will affect the compactness of the layout

: The gravity of each cluster, which will affect the compactness of each cluster. Takes effect only when

: The strength of node force. Positive value means attractive force, negative value means repulsive force
: The strength of edge force. Calculated according to the degree of nodes by default
: Whether to prevent node overlappings. To activate preventing node overlappings,

: The strength of force for preventing node overlappings. The range is [0, 1]
: The diameter of the node. It is used for preventing node overlappings. If
is not assigned, the size property in node data will take effect. If the size in node data does not exist either,
. It is the minimum distance between nodes to prevent node overlappings. It can be a function to define different distances for different nodes (example 2)
: The decay ratio of alpha for convergence. The range is [0, 1]. 0.028 corresponds to 300 iterations
: The threshold to stop the iteration
: Customed force simulation. If it is not assigned, the force simulation of d3.js will take effect
: The callback function of each iteration
: Whether to enable the web-worker in case layout calculation takes too long to block page interaction
: The alignment of the nodes. U: upper; D: down; L: left; R: right
'UL': aligns the nodes to the upper left;
'UR': aligns the nodes to the upper right;
'DL': aligns the nodes to the down left;
'DR': aligns the nodes to the upper right.
: The separation between nodes with unit px. When
represents the horizontal separations between nodes; When
represents the vertical separations between nodes
: The separations between adjacent levels with unit px. When
represents the vertical separations between adjacent levels; when

: The function for node separation with unit px. You can adjust the separations between different node pairs by using this function instead of
represents the vertical separations between nodes. The priority of

，只有设置了与当前图节点大小相同的
值，才能够进行节点重叠的碰撞检测
：节点大小（直径）。用于防止节点重叠时的碰撞检测
：环与环之间最小间距，用于调整半径
：第一个节点与最后一个节点之间的弧度差。若为 undefined ，则将会被设置为  2 _ Math.PI _ (1 - 1 / |level.nodes|) ，其中 level.nodes 为该算法计算出的每一层的节点，|level.nodes| 代表该层节点数量
：环与环之间的距离是否相等
：每一层同心值的求和。若为 undefined，则将会被设置为 maxValue / 4 ，其中 maxValue 为最大的排序依据的属性值。例如，若
，则 maxValue 为所有节点中度数最大的节点的度数
：指定排序的依据（节点属性名），数值越高则该节点被放置得越中心。若为 undefined，则会计算节点的度数，度数越高，节点将被放置得越中心
: 是否启用 web-worker 以防布局计算时间过长阻塞页面交互
: Whether to prevent node overlappings. To activate preventing node overlappings,
is required, which is used for collide detection. The size in the node data will take effect if
is not assigned. If the size in node data does not exist either,
: The diameter of the node. It is used for preventing node overlappings
: The minimum separation between adjacent circles

: How many radians should be between the first and last node (defaults to full circle). If it is undefined, 2 _ Math.PI _ (1 - 1 / |level.nodes|) will be used, where level.nodes is nodes set of each level, |level.nodes| is the number of nodes of the level
: Whether levels have an equal radial distance between them, may cause bounding box overflow
: Place the nodes in clockwise or not
: The sum of concentric values in each level. If it is undefined, maxValue / 4 will take place, where maxValue is the max value of ordering properties. For example, if
, maxValue is the max degree value of all the nodes

: Order the nodes according to this parameter. It is the property's name of node. The node with higher value will be placed to the center. If it is undefined, the algorithm will order the nodes by their degree
: Whether to enable the web-worker in case layout calculation takes too long to block page interaction
: The max number of the interations
: Whether to prevent node overlappings and combo overlappings. If it is assign
: Whether to prevent node overlappings. To activate preventing node overlappings,
is required, which is used for collide detection. The size in the node data will take effect if
: The unified strength of force for preventing node overlappings and combo overlappings. The range is [0, 1]. If it is not undefined, the
will be set to the same value
: The strength of force for preventing node overlappings. The range is [0, 1]
: The strength of force for preventing combo overlappings. The range is [0, 1]
: The diameter of the node. It is used for preventing node overlappings. If
is not assigned, the size property in node data will take effect. If the size in node data does not exist either,
. It is the minimum distance between nodes to prevent node overlappings. It can be a function to define different distances for different nodes (example 2)
. It is the minimum distance between combos to prevent combo overlappings. It can be a function to define different distances for different combos (example 2)
: The padding value inside each combo. It is not about rendering, only used for force calculation
: The decay ratio of alpha for convergence. The range is [0, 1]. 0.028 corresponds to 300 iterations
: The threshold to stop the iteration
: The callback function of each iteration
: The gravity, which will affect the compactness of the layout
: The gravity of each combo, which will affect the compactness of each combo
: When the distance between two nodes is larger than
, the forces between them will not be calculated any more. A proper value for
will lead to less calculation to optimize the performance of the layout
: The scale for adjusting the strength of attractive force between nodes with different depths. The range is [0, 1]. Lager the depth difference, smaller the attractive force strength
: The scale for adjusting the strength of repulsive force between nodes with different depths. The range is [1, Infinity]. Lager the depth difference, larger the attractive force strength
: The decay speed of the moving velocity of nodes
: Whether to enable the web-worker in case layout calculation takes too long to block page interaction
: The radius of the circle. If the
: The start radius of spiral layout
: The end radius of spiral layout
: The division number of the nodes on the circle. Takes effect when
by default, which means the nodes are arranged in data order. 'topology' means in topology order; 'degree' means in degree order.
: How many 2*PIs Between the first node and the last node

时生效, 防止重叠时节点边缘间距的最小值。可以是回调函数, 为不同节点设置不同的最小间距, 如示例 2 所示
时生效, 防止重叠时 combo 边缘间距的最小值。可以是回调函数, 为不同节点设置不同的最小间距, 如示例 2 所示
: Combo 内部的 padding 值，不用于渲染，仅用于计算力。推荐设置为与视图上 combo 内部 padding 值相同的值
：迭代阈值的衰减率。范围 [0, 1]。0.028 对应迭代数为 300
：重力的大小，影响布局的紧凑程度
：每个 combo 内部的重力大小，影响聚类的紧凑程度
：优化计算性能，两节点间距超过
则不再计算斥力和重叠斥力。通过合理设置该参数可以较少计算量

：根据边两端节点层级差距的调整斥力系数的因子，取值范围 [1, Infinity]。层级差距越大，斥力越大

：圆的半径。若设置了 radius，则 startRadius 与 endRadius 不生效

：节点在环上排序的依据。默认 null 代表直接使用数据中的顺序。'topology' 按照拓扑排序。'degree' 按照度数大小排序
：从第一个节点到最后节点之间相隔多少个 2*PI

title.en: Use hulls to wrap the node sets.
Interactively change the members in the hull.
